channel.title: 2006Lives - X1 RuneScape Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://bit.ly/M8Ac1W][IMG]http://s10.flagcounter.com/mini/M8Ac1W/bg_000000/txt_786D72/border_CCCCCC/flags_0/[/img][/URL][FONT=System] [IMG]http://2006lives.freeserver.me/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=7][COLOR=Orange]Beta[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[URL=http://www.2006lives.freeserver.me]Website[/URL] [URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/cie10phdr07vdtv/client.jar]Jar Download[/URL] [URL=http://www.2006lives.freeserver.me/webclient/details.php]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://2006lives.freeserver.me/screenshots.php]Media[/URL]
[COLOR=RED][SIZE=5]About[/SIZE][/COLOR] 2006Lives is a 2006 remake, we currently in f2p Beta. In f2p Beta all p2p content is closed, until we fix/add more content. We tried creating a 2007 remake but the client we were using had so many flaws. We spent hours and hours coding in npc emotes, and only a handful worked the rest were still buggy, so there went our hopes. Me and Mod Jay decided to just get a 317 loading 377 client, and here it is! We do not promise 100% uptime, expect somewhere around 99%. We want to maintain a close remake, but like oldschool we will be polling suggestions. [SIZE=5]The experience rate will be set to 1x.[/SIZE]
[COLOR=RED][SIZE=5]Development Team[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Mod Cal[/COLOR]: Also known as Carlos, is the [B]Head Developer[/B]. He is 15 years old of age, and is in charge of all the developers and make sure everything is right. He is also the founder of Drimestic Comics and creator of 2006Lives. [COLOR=RED]Mod Jay[/COLOR]: Also known as Monkey or Master Jay on forums, is the [B]Fault & Content Developer[/B]. What he does is fix all reported bugs, and adds game content. He is a respectful and helpful young man!
[/FONT] [FONT=SYSTEM] [IMG]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130921115623/2007scape/images/f/fe/Attack_icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Attack[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All weapons can be wielded. [*]All weapons have there correct definitions. [*]All weapons have there respected interfaces. [*]Clipping[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091620/2007scape/images/3/3e/Strength-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Strength[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All weapons can be wielded. [*]All weapons have there correct definitions.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091718/2007scape/images/d/d8/Defence-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Defence[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:95%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All equipment can be wielded. [*]All equipment have there correct definitions.[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE] [*]All special equipment have their correct values.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228040729/2007scape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Ranged[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All bows can be wielded. [*]All bows have there correct definitions. [*]All correct interfaces. [*]Arrows to there respected bows. [*]Clipping[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041522/2007scape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Prayer[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All bones bury-able. [*]Every prayer working properly. [*]Perfect prayer drain rate.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041539/2007scape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Magic[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]Teleporting to cities require runes and level. [*]All spells work correctly. [*]All correct interfaces. [*]Clipped[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041558/2007scape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Runecrafting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]Tiaras [*]Finding altars [*]All working altars.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041615/2007scape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Crafting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][*][COLOR=GREEN]Working interfaces[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091749/2007scape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Mining[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All ores can be minded. [*]Emptying and refilling rocks. [*]Prospecting. [*]Correct pickaxe finding and animations.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091815/2007scape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Smithing[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All bars smithable [*]Smelting [*]Correct animations and objects. [*]Working interfaces[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041652/2007scape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Fishing[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:95%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All fishes fishable [*]Correct equipment [*]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED] [*]Moving locations[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228040755/2007scape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Cooking[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]All fishes cookable [*]All meats cookable [*]Other things cookable [*]Correct animations and delays. [*]Eating Food [*]Working interfaces[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041715/2007scape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Firemaking[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]Correct animations, delay [*]Ashes [*]All logs lightable [*]Can click logs on ground and light [*]Clipped[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041636/2007scape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Woodcutting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:100%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]Stumps and regrowing trees [*]Correct hatchet animations [*]All trees cut-able [*]Birds nest[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED] [*]Canoes[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://www.2006lives.freeserver.me/img/forum/icons/quest.gif[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Quests[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:0.5%[/SIZE]
[ul][COLOR=GREEN] [*]Quest point system.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Minigames[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:10%[/SIZE]
[ul][*][COLOR=GREEN]Duel Arena[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Misc[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=1]Estimated completion:70%[/SIZE]
[/FONT] [SPOILER=P2P Features][FONT=SYSTEM] [IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091638/2007scape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Agility[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042634/2007scape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Herblaw[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042655/2007scape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Thieving[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042715/2007scape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Fletching[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042733/2007scape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Slayer[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042814/2007scape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Farming[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[/FONT][/CENTER]

2006Lives is a 2006 remake, we currently in f2p Beta. In f2p Beta all p2p content is closed, until we fix/add more content. We tried creating a 2007 remake but the client we were using had so many flaws. We spent hours and hours coding in npc emotes, and only a handful worked the rest were still buggy, so there went our hopes. Me and Mod Jay decided to just get a 317 loading 377 client, and here it is! We do not promise 100% uptime, expect somewhere around 99%.
